flexpy.WordForm module¶

class flexpy.WordForm.WordForm(forms, citation_forms, morph_types, glosses, poses, tag_dict)¶

Bases: object

Contains the information about a single word, which may be from a text,

or an item in the lexicon.

Parameters

  • forms (list<str>) – the list of forms for each morpheme

  • citation_forms (list<str>) – the list of citation forms for each morpheme

  • morph_types (list<str>) – the list of morph types for each morpheme

  • glosses (list<str>) – the list of glosses for each morpheme

  • poses (list<str>) – the list of parts of speech for each morpheme

  • tag_dict (TagDict) –
